trans-unit.source: Represents a group of related items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> class.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection.
Gets or sets a value that indicates that the gallery category distributes all its available width equally between its columns.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.ColumnsStretchToFill%2A> property only has an effect when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.IsSharedColumnSizeScope%2A> is set to `true`.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
`true` if the gallery category distributes its available width equally between its columns; otherwise, `false`.
The registered default is `false`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.ColumnsStretchToFill"></xref> dependency property.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> object.

A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> for the ribbon gallery header.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
One of the enumeration values that specifies the visibility of the header.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility.Visible"></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.HeaderVisibility"></xref> dependency property.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to test.
`true` if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether this gallery category defines the scope used for uniform layout of items.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
`true` if this gallery category defines the scope used for uniform layout of items; otherwise, `false`.
The registered default is `true`.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.IsSharedColumnSizeScope"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel"></xref>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The maximum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel"></xref>.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Int32.MaxValue"></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.MaxColumnCount"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the minimum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel"></xref>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The minimum number of columns used to lay out items in a gallery <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel"></xref>.The registered default is 1.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory.MinColumnCount"></xref> dependency property.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.

This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> event and adds an event listener to listen for currency changes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> for the category.
The event data.
Invoked when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> property changes.
Information about the change.
Invoked when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource"></xref> property changes.
The old value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource"></xref> property.
The new value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource"></xref> property.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection.
Receives events from the centralized event manager.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
The object that originated the event.
The event data.
`true` if the listener handled the event.
`false` if it receives an event that it does not recognize or handle.
